job.title: Data Scientist - REMOTE
job.description: ltpgtEight Sleep is looking for a mobilefocused Data Scientist to help launch a new business intelligence effort This role will largely focus on data pipeline and data warehouse issues while also supporting advances in customer lifecycle marketing business intelligence platform customer lifetime value customer segmentation user flow onsite creative analysis AB testing etc ltpgtltpgtltstronggtltbrgtltstronggt ltpgtltpgtltstronggtHow youll contributeltstronggt ltpgtltulgtltligtUse data exploration techniques to discover new correlations in sleep and wearable data ltligtltligtDesign and implement algorithms that power our sleep intelligence impact the life of our customers every day ltligtltligtContribute to product decisions by providing context via data and metrics analysis ltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtltbrgtltstronggt ltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhat youll need to succeed ltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt3 years of handson experience with data science or analytics in a business context ltligtltligt2 years of experience working with Python in a production environment ltligtltligt2 years of SQL experience ltligtltligtMachine Learning and statistical modeling experience preferred ltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtltbrgtltstronggt ltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhy youll love Eight ltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtWere a tightknit passionate team thats working to improve peoples
